message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints. While I'm willing to negotiate,  $10,800 is simply too low for me. I'm happy to meet you halfway, but I need to see $11,150 to make this work. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us both to get a good deal. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $11,000. Can you consider this offer?
